mitigationAction.documentationCalculationsEstimateReducti: Documentation of the calculations of the estimate of the reduction of emissions in CO2 equivalent
mitigationAction.methodologyExantePotentialReductionEmiss: Methodology for calculating the ex-ante estimate of the potential reduction of emissions in CO2 equivalent
mitigationAction.sourcesEmissionsGasesCovered: Sources of emissions and gases covered
mitigationAction.periodPotentialEmissionReductionEstimate: Period in which the potential emission reduction is estimated
mitigationAction.preliminaryIdentificationSustainableDeve: Idntificación preliminar de los Objetivos de Desarrollo Sostenible (ODS) impactados
mitigationAction.sectorsGEIInventoryImpacted: Sectors of the GEI inventory impacted
mitigationAction.graphicLogicImpactEmissionsRemovals: Graphic description with the logic in the form of a causal chain of the impact on emissions and removals
mitigationAction.overviewImpactEmissionsRemovals: Overview of the impact on emissions and removals
mitigationAction.nameRegisteredMideplan: Under what name is the project registered in Mideplan?
mitigationAction.registeredNonReimbursableCooperationMide: Is the action registered in the registry of non-reimbursable international cooperation projects of Mideplan?
mitigationAction.financedSourcesInternationalCooperation: Acciones financiadas con fuentes de cooperación internacional
mitigationAction.financingSourceApplying: Describe the financing source to which you are applying
mitigationAction.stepsTakingToFinancing: What steps are you taking to access financing?
mitigationAction.entitiesInvolvedMitigationActionCtrl: Other entities involved in mitigation action
mitigationAction.addReviewMA: Add a new review for this mitigation action
mitigationAction.descriptionReviewMA: Description of the review of the Mitigation Action

reportData.sentInstitutions: How this file is sent to other institutions?
reportData.exampleToSend: Example: e-mail, web page, REST API Call, SFTP, FTP, WeTransfer, other.
reportData.submitNewFileVersion: Submit a new report file version

ppcn.ppcnUpdateSuccess: The PPCN form was updated successfully
ppcn.costInventoryRemovals: Cost of carrying out inventory of removals
ppcn.complexityMethodologies: Complexity of the calculation methodologies used
ppcn.numberFacilities: Number of facilities of the organization
ppcn.organitationCategoryPpcn: Organization category (According to section 8 of the PPCN 2.0)
ppcn.organitationCategory: Organization Category (A, B, C or D)
ppcn.verificationOVV: Cost of the verification process carried out by the OVV
ppcn.costGHG: Cost of carrying out the GHG inventory (Including internal audits if applicable)
ppcn.reportOtherGases: In cases of reporting 'Other Gases' indicate all other gases reported

ppcnDocument.certificateCompensationDescription: Purchase of the GEI emissions compensation service indicating the name of the project, its location, the amount of credits acquired and the date of acquisition.
ppcnDocument.mitigationActionPlanDescription: That includes the mitigation projects to be developed by the canton or district.
ppcnDocument.verificationReportDescription: Verification report issued by the Verification Committee.
ppcnDocument.geiReportCantDescription: That endorse the Declaration of greenhouse gases of the participating canton or district that includes details of the reduction actions carried out, if applicable.
ppcnDocument.legalPersonDescription: In the case of a legal entity, a copy of the certification of current legal status issued by the National Registry and a copy of the identity card of the legal representative.
ppcnDocument.physicalPersonDescription: In the case of an individual, a photocopy of the identity card of the person in charge of the organization.
ppcnDocument.CCSSWorkerFeesDescription: Certificate that it is up-to-date with the CCSS worker-employer quotas. (Online consultation is accepted, but its issue date must be from the day the documents are presented)
ppcnDocument.sanitaryPermitDescription: Copy of the Sanitary Operation Permit (PSF) from the Ministry of Health or the Veterinary Operation Certificate (CVO) from the Ministry of Agriculture and Livestock of the facilities
ppcnDocument.municipalObligationsDescription: Certification that it is up to date with municipal obligations (payment of municipal taxes up to date). (Online consultation is accepted where it indicates that it is up to date, payment invoices are not accepted)
ppcnDocument.openConvictionsDescription: Affidavit signed by the legal representative of the organization, indicating that the organization does not have open convictions for environmental causes and that it complies with all applicable laws and regulations of the country. The statement must include a commitment to inform DCC immediately if the organization is no longer in compliance with the laws of the country.
ppcnDocument.GEIreportDescription: GEI report supporting the GEI statement that the organization submits to the OVV, including the GEI inventory and the organization's facilities included within the inventory (indicating the details of organizational charts and / or buildings, production plants, as well as emission sources associated with these facilities). (If during the verification process the organization modifies the Report or the GEI inventory data, it must present the updated version of the Report that includes the modifications requested by the OVV)
ppcnDocument.GEIManagementPlanDescription: GEI management plan with reduction actions, where the goals, monitoring indicators, people responsible, objectives, etc. are indicated.
ppcnDocument.verificationreportOVV: Verification report issued by the OVV
ppcnDocument.verificationreportOVVDescription: Verification report issued by the OVV and, if there are findings that affect the data that support the declaration, the evidence of the final emissions, reductions, removals and offsets must be submitted; It must be signed by the OVV (this information must be reported through the GEI report).
ppcnDocument.copyGEIVerification: Copy of GHG Verification Statement document
ppcnDocument.copyGEIVerificationDescription: Copy of the GEI Verification Declaration document issued by the accredited OVV, must come with the signature of the OVV.
ppcnDocument.ownRemovalsDescription: In the event that the organization has its own removals, the certification of the registry must be attached where the project owner is referred to.
ppcnDocument.organizationLogoDescription: Attach the Logo of the Organization. This is to be posted on the DCC website, in the organizations that are part of the Country Program.
ppcnDocument.purchaseCertificateDescription: Certificate of purchase of the greenhouse gas emissions mitigation service from FONAFIFO or endorsement of another compensation mechanism used.
ppcnDocument.formalConclusionVV: Evidence on the formal conclusion of the OVV
ppcnDocument.formalConclusionVVDescription: Evidence on the formal conclusion of the OVV about the fulfillment or not of the criteria to be able to be plus.
ppcnDocument.FONAFIFOPurchaseCertificateDescription: Certificate of purchase of the greenhouse gas emissions mitigation service from FONAFIFO or endorsement of another compensation mechanism used.
ppcnDocument.supportingEvidenceDescription: Evidence that supports the actions taken to be a candidate for the plus recognition.
ppcnDocument.evidenceOVVConclusionDescription: Evidence on the formal conclusion of the OVV about the fulfillment or not of the criteria to be able to be plus.
ppcnDocument.evidenceActionsTakenDescription: Evidence that supports the actions taken to be a candidate for the plus recognition.

general.maxWords: The number of accepted words is:
general.keyAspects: Identification of impacts on mitigation and on SDG

errorLabel.error504: We have problem connecting to the server

errorLabel.error401: You do not have the necessary permissions, please contact the system administrator

specificLabel.documentationImpactEstimate: Documentación de la estimación de impactos
specificLabel.mitigationEmissions: Estimation of impacts on Greenhouse Gases (GEI)

specificLabel.sourcesConsultedCalculationMethodology: Sources consulted for the calculation methodology
specificLabel.emissionDateDeclarationVerification: Emission Date of the declaration of verification
